title: Understanding Font Size Adjustment
text: To change the font size of a cell entry, you need to access the font size settings. This is usually found in the toolbar or menu options of your spreadsheet software.

title: Locating the Font Size Option
text: Look for an option labeled 'Font Size' or a dropdown menu with numbers indicating different sizes. This is where you can adjust the font size.

hintAnswer: Click on the cell and adjust the font size in "font size gallery"
title: Selecting the Correct Method
text: Which of the following methods correctly describes how to increase the font size of a cell entry?
choices: Click on the cell and adjust the font size in "font size gallery"
>Click on the cell and press the up arrow
>Click on the cell and type in a number for the font size.
